title: Bulldogs to Host 2017 Icebreaker
text:
Bulldogs to Host 2017 Icebreaker 
By Norman Seawright III October 17, 2015 Updated Oct 17, 2015 at 10:19 PM CDT 
Duluth, MN (NNCNOW.com) -- In a press conference, University of Minnesota-Duluth (UMD) Athletic Director Josh Berlo announced that the Bulldogs will host the season-opening Icebreaker tournament in 2017. 
"This is what we feel is the premiere early season college hockey tournament," Berlo said. "And will put the Bulldogs at the front of the college hockey season, and the amount of attention and the focus will be on our great program, our great community, and our great facility."
